executable.title: MultiImageRegistration
executable.description: This programs implemented non-rigid groupwise registration by using B-Spline Defomation model.
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Yongqiang Zhao.

parameters.label: IO
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the input files name and parameters file for groupwise registratioin.

integer.name: numImages
integer.label: number of Images
integer.description: The name of file that lists all the image files'name for groupwise registration.

file.name: labelmapFilenames
file.label: Name of files
file.description: The name of file that lists all the parameters for groupwise registration.

string.name: priorFilename
string.label: Name of output file
string.description: The name of file that lists all the image files'name for groupwise registration.

integer.name: numLabels
integer.label: number of Labels
integer.description: The name of file that lists all the image files'name for groupwise registration.

string.name: labelValues
string.label: Name of labels
string.description: The name of file that lists all the parameters for groupwise registration.

float.name: intensityScale
float.label: scaling of Factor
float.description: The name of file that lists all the image files'name for groupwise registration.
